## What is Rapier?

[Rapier](https://github.com/dimforge/rapier) is the 2D and 3D physics engines for the Rust programming language.

## Example

```{r bouncing_ball}
#| animation.hook: 'gifski'
#| interval: !expr 1/60
#| 
library(rpr2dr)

d <- bouncing_ball()

for (i in seq_len(nrow(d))) {
  plot(d[i, ], ylim = c(0, 1), cex = 4)
}
```
